Elden Ring Details

Quick Facts

  • Release Date: February 25, 2022
  • Developer: FromSoftware
  • Publisher: Bandai Namco
  • Platforms: PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PC
  • Genre: Action RPG
  • Price: £49.99

Game Description

Elden Ring is an action RPG set in a vast open world known as the Lands Between. Created by FromSoftware and George R.R. Martin, the game features challenging combat, deep lore, and unprecedented freedom to explore and discover.

Key Features

  • Vast open world with seamless exploration
  • Deep, challenging combat system
  • Rich character customization and build variety
  • Epic boss battles
  • Unique multiplayer integration
  • Complex and engaging storyline

Game Systems

Combat

Strategic combat system with various weapons, spells, and skills.

Exploration

Open world traversal with hidden dungeons and secrets.

Multiplayer

Co-op and PvP features for enhanced gameplay experience.

Ready for the Challenge?

Become the Elden Lord in this epic adventure!
